research_queries.query: React Native geolocation battery drain production issues 2024 2025
findings: Android 14 and iOS 17 introduced STRICTER limitations on background services and power consumption
Apps face forced shutdowns and restricted background operations without optimization
Continuous location tracking can cause severe battery drain complaints from beta testers
Requires battery-friendly options like reduced polling intervals and essential-only monitoring
research_queries.implications: SPEC assumption of '<10% battery impact' is OPTIMISTIC - real-world reports show significant drain issues even with optimization

research_queries.query: PostgreSQL PostGIS performance degradation large datasets production problems
findings: TOAST table issues cause query optimizer weakness with large geometries
35 million records caused performance degradation in production ETL processes
4.7 million record tables show slowness in QGIS attribute table access
Default PostgreSQL config is 'very conservative' and inappropriate for production geospatial databases
Workaround: 'SET enable_seqscan TO off' to force index usage - indicates planner issues
research_queries.implications: TECH-001 mitigation is INCOMPLETE - does not address TOAST tables, query planner weakness, or production tuning requirements

research_queries.query: Meilisearch scaling issues beyond 10 million documents performance
findings: CRITICAL: 116M document test couldn't complete in 2 days (only 38% loaded)
10M e-commerce documents took 8 HOURS to index just 4M documents on 16GB RAM
Insertion performance degrades linearly - 200k docs = 500ms per document
Meilisearch recommends keeping indexes UNDER 2TiB for performance (80TiB theoretical max)
NO horizontal scaling support - only vertical (single machine)
research_queries.implications: TECH-STACK choice of Meilisearch has SEVERE scaling cliff - projected 100M events by Year 2 may be IMPOSSIBLE without complete rewrite

research_queries.query: Supabase Realtime connection limits failures production outages
findings: Connections disconnected if project generates 'too many messages per second'
Python client experiences 'keepalive ping timeout' and 'join push timeout' failures
September 2024: Production instability detected in Realtime Cluster
Client reaches maximum allowed connections causing production failures
Rate limiting causes disconnections with auto-reconnect only after throughput decreases
research_queries.implications: Real-time features (live attendance, notifications) will FAIL during peak usage (Friday evenings, major events) - creates poor UX exactly when most valuable

research_queries.query: Google Cloud Platform hidden costs billing surprises startup stories
findings: CRITICAL: Milkie Way startup received $72,000 bill OVERNIGHT on $7 budget
Another startup: $450,000 Google Cloud Bill (case study)
Setting a budget DOES NOT cap spending - critical flaw
Network egress costs are 'hidden' and easily overlooked
Persistent Disks billed on PROVISIONED capacity, not actual usage
research_queries.implications: BUS-001 mitigation 'monitoring' is INSUFFICIENT - budgets don't prevent runaway costs, need HARD LIMITS and automated shutdown triggers

research_queries.query: Stripe payment failure edge cases chargeback dispute handling 2024
findings: Full dispute lifecycle takes 2-3 MONTHS to complete
Merchants have only 7-21 days to respond (network dependent)
Chargeback Protection has $25,000 ANNUAL LIMIT (not per-incident)
Only covers FRAUD disputes - not product dissatisfaction
Monthly fines for exceeding network dispute thresholds
Dispute fee NOT returned if you lose (except Mexico)
research_queries.implications: SEC-002 assumes Stripe Radar solves fraud - but $25K annual limit means Year 2 projected $3M GMV has MASSIVE exposure gap

research_queries.query: event discovery app user acquisition failures case studies startup post-mortem
findings: IRL: Raised $200M, achieved unicorn status, then SHUT DOWN after discovering 95% of 20M users were FAKE
Plancast: Failed because 'most people don't go to that many events' - no daily habit formation
Event discovery industry: 90% of people look for events ONCE A WEEK OR LESS
Zero customer loyalty, zero switching costs in event discovery space
Moped messaging app: Inability to achieve user retention and customer acquisition led to failure
research_queries.implications: MKT-002 retention target of 15% Day-30 may be IMPOSSIBLE - Plancast failed specifically due to infrequent event attendance behavior

research_queries.query: AI content moderation false positive rates Perspective API AWS Rekognition accuracy
findings: Perspective API: At threshold 0, achieves perfect recall BUT 94.7% are FALSE POSITIVES (precision 0.053)
Perspective API: 'Nearly all non-uncivil instances incorrectly flagged as incivility'
AWS Rekognition: Reduced false positives by 68% (improvement), but still requires human review of 1-5%
Machine learning can flag up to 95% of unsafe content automatically
Both services 'not infallible' and produce false positives/negatives
research_queries.implications: SEC-004 assumes AI can auto-block >90% toxicity - but Perspective API has 95% false positive rate at sensitive thresholds, will block LEGITIMATE content

research_queries.query: GDPR compliance enforcement examples fines location-based apps 2023 2024
findings: Uber: EUR 290M fine (2024) for transferring location data to US without safeguards
TikTok: EUR 345M fine (2023) for children's data processing violations
LinkedIn: EUR 310M fine (2024) for unlawful behavioral analysis
Grindr: EUR 6.5M fine (2021) for disclosing user data without legal basis
Location data specifically triggers MASSIVE fines (Uber case)
research_queries.implications: SEC-003 GDPR mitigation is HIGH RISK - location data + behavioral analysis (AI recommendations) matches Uber AND LinkedIn violation patterns

research_queries.query: mobile app store rejection patterns location-based apps privacy issues 2024
findings: MAJOR CHANGE: May 1, 2024 - Privacy manifests REQUIRED for third-party SDKs
Apps without required reason API description rejected after May 1, 2024
Background location services require clear Info.plist explanations (Guideline 5.1.5)
Google Play rejects apps for Data Safety Section location data issues
Neither Apple nor Google rigorously test for vulnerabilities - focus on policy compliance
research_queries.implications: DEVELOPMENT-PLAN Week 13-14 'App Store submission' will likely FAIL without privacy manifest work - not mentioned in security implementation

research_queries.query: single-city launch failures startup case studies why local apps fail
findings: Yik Yak: Gained massive popularity on college campuses, raised $73.5M, SHUT DOWN in 2017 due to moderation challenges
Lantern: Top marijuana delivery in Massachusetts, $40M funding, ceased operations due to regulatory hurdles preventing expansion
9,999 in 10,000 mobile apps FAIL
Poor user acquisition strategies + inadequate technical infrastructure + leadership instability = perfect storm for collapse
Even with successful launch and working product, lack of market demand causes failure
research_queries.implications: MKT-001 single-city strategy is HIGH RISK - Yik Yak and Lantern both succeeded locally but FAILED to scale, stuck in single market

research_queries.query: retention metric calculation pitfalls cohort analysis mistakes startup analytics
findings: Common mistake: Grouping cohorts too broadly or narrowly
Retention calculations 'quickly become complex' due to various methods
Cohort analysis does NOT point out CAUSES of fluctuations - only tendencies
Zooming out on retention makes it harder to see details showing what's wrong
Must break analysis into early, middle, and late retention periods
Not comparing cohorts properly or accounting for external factors produces 'off' insights
research_queries.implications: SPEC success metrics 'Day 30 retention >15%' is OVERSIMPLIFIED - needs early/middle/late breakdown and may miss actual failure causes

validated_assumptions: PostgreSQL + PostGIS is faster than MongoDB for geospatial queries (confirmed: 5-50x faster)
React Native provides good GPS/native API access (confirmed: extensive library ecosystem)
GDPR violations result in massive fines (confirmed: EUR 290M - 345M fines in 2023-2024)

invalidated_assumptions.assumption: Meilisearch can handle 100M+ events at scale
invalidated_assumptions.reality: Meilisearch struggles beyond 10M documents, took 8 hours for 4M docs, no horizontal scaling

invalidated_assumptions.assumption: Battery drain can be kept under 10% with optimization
invalidated_assumptions.reality: Android 14/iOS 17 enforce stricter limits, beta testers commonly complain of drain even with optimization
Budgets DO NOT cap spending - $72K overnight bill on $7 budget example

invalidated_assumptions.assumption: Stripe Radar provides comprehensive fraud protection
invalidated_assumptions.reality: Chargeback Protection has $25K annual limit, only covers fraud (not disputes), 2-3 month resolution time

invalidated_assumptions.assumption: Event discovery can achieve high daily engagement
invalidated_assumptions.reality: 90% of people look for events once a week or less, Plancast failed due to lack of daily habit

invalidated_assumptions.assumption: AI content moderation can auto-block accurately
invalidated_assumptions.reality: Perspective API has 95% false positive rate at sensitive thresholds, will block legitimate content
Yik Yak and Lantern both succeeded locally but failed to scale beyond single market

invalidated_assumptions.assumption: Supabase Realtime handles peak usage reliably
invalidated_assumptions.reality: Disconnects under high message throughput, production outages reported in 2024
